Name: Miguel Angel
description:
Miguel Angel is 41 years old. He is in a common-law marriage. He lives with his partner in the district of Cayalt√≠, Chiclayo province, department of Lambayeque, Peru. He has very good personal and work references from people in the neighbourhood. The residents here predominantly work in farming, commerce and ranching.

He makes a living rearing and selling pigs, with more than 19 years experience in this field. He is requesting a loan to buy more animals such as chickens, ducks and pigs, and food for them. By doing so he can make a greater income for him and his family.

Miguel Angel is a returning member of Edpyme Alternativa.
